title: Group portrait of wedding party with six women, including bride Adah Moore Lavelle wearing gown with faintly striped yoke, small buttons on front, and long sleeves with puffed shoulders, Rosalind Lindsay, Romaine Denning, Geraldine Burgia, Euzzy Mahoney, Norma Branch; groom Robert Lavelle wearing light colored dinner jacket, eyeglasses, and dark bow tie, ring bearer Goode, and flower girl Iris Scott, posed in yard possibly on Chalfont Street, at night, another version
medium: black and white: Agfa Safety Film
